creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
I have a system running Java 1.6 that won't build the lucene module due to a
missing dependency on notification. It builds under Java 1.5, but not 1.6.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Fixed under trunk in r612541. Not sure how we want to roll this into 2.0. Wait
for 2.0.1?
